title: How to write an essay in the descriptive paper in the CGL Tier 3 - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam

response.answer_text: Before writing an essay Prepare a rough layout in your mind….!!! The Good essay always written in 3 parts…!!! All those who wrote essay in these 3 parts got good marks in descriptive…!! First Introduction of essay Second Body or Contents Third Conclusion And also include Quotes, Data and good examples….!!!! It will prove Ice on the cake for your essay….!!!
